총 할당 계정 용량 도움말: What is 'Total Accounts Quota'? It is total accounts quota of the site. Site administrators can distribute quota to each account within Total Accounts Quota
공용 용량 도움말: What is 'Public Quota'? Public Quota means how much the site can accommodate data from Storage, Board, Community > Board, Report and Task menu.
공용 용량 초과시 제재 도움말: If Public Quota Excess Restriction is enabled, users of the site cannot upload an attachment to Storage, Board, Community > Board, Report and Task.

웹주소 설명: Enter a web address of the domain. (eg) www.daou.co.kr, go.daou.com
가상 도메인 설명: Enter a virtual domain address that the domain has. A virtual domain uses all the data the domain above has identically. For example, if you set daou.com as a virtual domain of daou.co.kr, daou.com and daou.co.kr will be handled exactly the same.
사용자별 가상 도메인 설명: The virtual domain will be applied to all users in the domain. If you want to apply differently by users, enter a virtual domain in Virtual Domain for User. A site administrator can select a domain among domains entered here.

Total Quota(Total account quota + Public quota) is {{arg1}}.
사이트 공용 용량 툴팁: What is 'Public Quota'? Public Quota is a storage that everyone uses which means how much the storage can accommodate data from Storage, Board, Chat, Report and other menus.
사이트 할당 계정 용량 툴팁: What is 'Total Accounts Quota'? Total Accounts Quota is a storage that everyone uses which means how much the storage can accomodate data from private Storage and Mail. Each account can have different Mail and private storage quota. Please refer list of accounts to confirm usage status.
기타 용량 툴팁: Others quota is an additional usage status that includes menu, profile pictures, temporary storage, other images for guiding information, which is not shown in usage status.
변경이력 사용여부 툴팁: You can confirm change history under monthly/user usage status. Time will not be shown if you disable change history.
총 할당 계정 용량 초과: You can not add new account because of quota excess. Please reset or add mail/storage quota of mail group.

근무시간 산정 설명:
In Status, the time entered by the user is displayed, but depending on the settings below, the total working time may look different.
Rest time is excluded in working hours.
전자결재를 통해 연장근무 승인완료 시, 총 근무시간에 추가산정됩니다: Upon approval of the overtime work via approval, additional work hours are calculated.
퇴근 체크를 하지 않은 경우 아래 설정에 따라 강제로 자동퇴근을 통해 퇴: If the user does not record the time that leave office, the time will be recorded as a forced exit according to the settings below.
퇴근 미체크 시,: If do not check for work,
에 자동 퇴근 체크: Check for automatic leave office to
설정한 시간대에서만 야간근무신청이 가능합니다: You can apply for night shift only in the set time zone.
총 근무시간 산정에 제외됩니다: Excluded in calculation of total working hours.
차단할 사용자 혹은 그룹을 설정 (차단한 사용자 외 모든 사용자는 메뉴에: Set the user or group to be blocked (all users other than the blocked user can access the menu)
허용할 사용자 혹은 그룹을 설정 (허용할 사용자 외 모든 사용자는 메뉴에: Set the user or group to be allowed (the menu is not accessible to all users except the user to be allowed)
* 근태 그룹 내 근무시간, 휴게시간 등 모든 설정 수정/그룹 삭제 시,: * If you modify or delete all settings such as working time and rest time in group, it will be applied the next day.
자동퇴근 설정 설명: If the user does not record the time that leave office, the time will be recorded as a forced exit according to the settings below.
타임라인 상태 툴팁: Authorized to register / modify the status in advance. For more information, please refer to the manual.
그룹 차단 설정: Set the user or group to block (All users except the blocked user are included in the group.)
그룹 허용 설정: Set the user or group to allow (Only allowed users are included in the group. Others are not included.)
그룹설정적용설명: * When adding / modifying / deleting all settings such as work time and rest time in group, it will be applied the next day.
근태관리 동기화 설명: ※ Work start / leave / status change button in Attendance is not displayed. Time recording and editing of attendance status is disabled.
조기 출근 시, 설정한 업무시작 시간 기준으로 근무시간 산정: When start work early, calculate working hours based on the set start time.
지각 시, 설정한 업무시작 시간 기준으로 근무시간 산정: When start work late, calculate the working hours based on the start time
늦은 퇴근 시, 설정한 업무종료 시간 기준으로 근무시간 산정: When leaving late, calculate the working hours based on the set work end time
* 위 설정에 따라 총 근무시간은 상이하게 보일 수 있습니다: * Depending on the above settings, the total working time may look different.
* 설정한 업무시작/업무종료 기준으로 근무시간 산정 시, 추가 근무를 하: * Based on the set start work / end work, the extra work will not be counted as overtime when calculating the working time.
* 전자결재 > 연장근무 신청서 사용 시, 승인이 완료되면 총 근무시간에: * If you use Approval> Overtime Application Form, it will be added to your total working hours after approval.
겸직자 비밀번호 동기화 비활성화 설명:
Disable the Password synchronization feature.
All related setting values are deleted and disabled.
겸직자 비밀번호 동기화 툴팁: Synchronize Passwords for Concurrent user. The security settings follow the 'Password synchronization policy settings'.
겸직자 비밀번호 동기화 정책 설정 툴팁: Set the security policy for people with a 'Password synchronization'. People who use Password synchronization will follow this policy, not their own site-specific security policy.
비밀번호 동기화 사용 겸직자 툴팁: Concurrent user with Password synchronization enabled. This users will follow the Password synchronization policy settings set by the system administrator.
비밀번호 동기화 onoff 툴팁: Synchronize all site passwords of concurrent user. You can use it in Others > Password policy settings.
부서 다운로드 도움말: Use the [Download Department List] to make sure that the department list is uploaded normally or that you can check the department code and department name information to make it easier to fill out the form.
부서 업로드 도움말: If it is the first department registration, or if you need to change it, please download it from [download department registration form] and upload it.
클래스 다운로드 도움말: Use the [Download Class List] button to check whether the class list is uploaded properly or to check the code and name information of each class and get help when filling out the form.
클래스 업로드 도움말: If it is your first class registration or you need to change it, please download it from [Download Class batch registration form] and upload it.
사용자 다운로드 도움말: Please check whether the account list is uploaded properly or check the user code and user name information and use the [Download Job Title List] button for help in filling out the form.
사용자 업로드 도움말: If it is the first user registration, or if you need to change it, download it from [Download User batch registration form] and upload it.
계정 등록 결과 도움말: After checking the registration result, if there is even one registration failure, please download [Download Failed List], delete the failure contents after uploading, and upload
업로드 양식 도움말: Please fill out the required fields in the form after deleting 2nd row.
보관 기간 설정 도움말: The input value is applied immediately. After a period of time, it will be automatically deleted based on your settings and will not be recovered.

in Account> Manage Department> Manage Organization Tree
계정업로드매니저 시작 문구:
The account upload manager can easily upload the data (department, title, position, etc.)
required for account registration.
Do you want to start registering now?
※ 보안설정 > 공통 > 안티 바이러스의 설정에서 [사이트 별 설정] 시: ※ Only work when Security Settings > Common > Antivirus [Site by Site] is set.
works reindexing url desc: You can re-index with the above UI, unavoidavly in case that it consists multiple components and it needs to operate only on certain equipment such as standby, you can use a combination of following URLs.
직위체계 설정 다운로드 설명:
Downloads the currently set position code information.
After downloading, you can modify and upload in bulk.
부서 설정 다운로드 설명:
Downloads the currently set department information in Organization Tree.
After downloading, you can modify and upload in bulk.
멤버 설정 다운로드 설명:
Downloads the currently set members information in Organiztion Tree.
After downloading, you can modify and upload in bulk.
직위체계 일괄등록 설명:
When adding a new code to each sheet of excel file, the new information will be created,
The existing information will be updated if the contents of the code already registered in the system are added/modified.
부서 일괄등록 설명:
When adding a new department code to excel file, the new department information will be created,
The existing information will be updated if the contents of the department code already registered in the system are added/modified.
멤버 일괄등록 설명:
When adding a new ID to excel file, the new member information will be created,
The existing information will be updated if the contents of the ID already registered in the system are added/modified.
샘플 양식 다운로드 설명:
When you register at the first time, after downloading sample forms
you can modify the contents to match ther format and register in bulk.
비밀번호 관리 설정 설명:
Password is only available for the first registration. (Already registerd member's password cannot modified to register)
{{{arg1}}} Please check the password rules first on screen.
파일을 등록하면, 아래 화면에서 추가한 내용을 확인 및 정정할 수 있습니: Once you register the file, you can check and correct your additioans on the screen below .
파일에서 확인한 총 0건 중 정상 0개, 오류 0개 입니다: Total {{totalCnt}} checked cases in file, Success {{successCnt}}, Error {{failCnt}}.
일괄등록 결과 테이블 설명:
The code * and the Korean name marked are required items.
After registering in bulk, displayed as a red error status Incorrect information will be not added.
If incorrect information is corrected re-registered, it is added.
You can add up to 1,000 pieces of information in bulk at a time.
All information in the file has been registered in bulk successfully.
메뉴로 이동하시겠습니까: Do you want to move to Menu {{menuName}}?
우측 템플릿에서 항목을 선택하여 직위 체계를 설계하세요: Select items from the right templates and design the position code.
직위 설명: As a core classification system, it is used as basic information for members on multiple screens.
직책 설명: As a role in the department, it is used to set the approval line.
직급 설명: This is an optional system. Office job (code) templates are also convenient.
사용자그룹 설명: This is an optional system. Create and use the groups your company needs.
예시를 통해 쉽게 이해하는 직위 체계: Easily understood the position code by example
예시를 통해 쉽게 이해하는 직위 체계 설명:
The position code defineds position(simple), title, grade(detailed) and user group.
You can set it up as an import from the right templates.
직위 예시 설명:
The position is a title that represents the rankikng of a member in the company.
Commonly use a simplified grade.
Core system, it is used as basic information for members on multiple screens.
직위 예시 설명 세부1: Example : Director, Managing Director, Manager, Deputy General Manager, Deouty Manager, Chief, Assistant Manager
직위 예시 설명 세부2: About 70 samples are provided that commonly used in 5 templates, including office, research, production, manager and hospital/academy etc..
직책 예시 설명: The title is based on the responsibilities and authority associated with the membership (department). It is used to set the approval line.
직책 예시 설명 세부1: Example : CEO, Director, Genenral Manager, Team Manager, Part Manager etc..
직책 예시 설명 세부2: About 30 samples are proviede commonly used from one template.
직급 예시 설명:
The grade is a system of more detailed classification of positions.
Optional system, (Code)type template is convenient.
직급 예시 설명 세부1: Example : Manager4, B4, Principal Research Engineer2, SU2, 5grade the 2nd class salary etc..
직급 예시 설명 세부2: About 120 samples are proviede that commonly used in 5 templates, including office(name), office(code), research(name), research(code) and civil servant etc..
사용자그룹 예시 설명:
The user group is a system for classifying members besides the position code.
Optional system, Create and use the groups your company needs.
사용자그룹 예시 설명 세부1: Example : Contract Worker, Executive, Outsourcing, Intern, Affiliate etc..
사용자그룹 예시 설명 세부2: About 20 samples are provided from one template.
기본 관리 권한설명: Controls basic settings for a site, such as menu management, administrator for each menu.
보안 관리 권한설명: Controls security-related parts such as login, password policies and access restrictions.
조직 관리 권한설명: The organization is organized/managed, such as members, deparments ands positions.
메뉴 관리 권한설명: Set/manage each munu used by the site.
권한 설정 툴팁: Set the accessible menu authority settings per administrator. </br> Depending on authority, the access menu on >Admin Site> is restricted to prevent sensitive information from being exposed or lost. </br> ※ When you create a site administrator through a system administrator, you are careated as >the default administrator>.
자동정렬 툴팁: When on, Sort staffs in the way specified in [Settings>Automatic sorting settings] at the top of right of organization tree. When OFF, Click the Replace Order button to set up staffs order manually.
검색할 운영자 명을 입력하세요: Please enter the admin name to searching
앱운영관리자일괄삭제설명:
All Admin/Manager of selected app will be deleted,
it cannot be reversed.

Do you want to delete admin in bulk?
결재양식운영자변경설명:
If you want to change template admin, the version of approval template is updated and cannot be rewritten with the previous template version.

Do you want to change template adminin?
비밀번호 툴팁: Please enter the way set in [Security settings>Passward Setting].
사용자그룹 툴팁: You can set multiple settings with what you set up on the user group of [Organization management-Position Code] tab.
메일그룹 툴팁:
You can select if you have set up more than one mail group.
Usually using Default.
선택한 권한 삭제 알림: Are you sure to delete selected authorization?
선택한 항목을 삭제하시겠습니까?: Do you really want to delete it?
부서 메일 아이디 설명:
It is ID for sending mail to all members of the department.
When you set up, you can select a department from the site's e-mail and forward it.
Ex) mkt > mkt@mycompany.com
부서 코드 설명:
it is used for division when registering a department in bulk. Without registration in bulk, you don't need to write down.
Some special characters including space are limited.
부서 약어 설명:
Short titles are used instead of department name for approval etc.
Some special characters including space are limited.
멤버 선택 알림: Please select a member to apply.
메일주소노출 팝업설명1:
Where used member's name on multiple screens kind of mail list/write/reply, organization tree, profile etc
[Used] Exposed member's name and e-mail address.
예외차단 클래스 선택 툴팁: The class selected here are not affected by the above selection allowed class.
예외허용 클래스 선택 툴팁: The class selected here are not affected by the above selection restricted class.
WEB 정책 툴팁: ※ Set up policies of PC and Mobile on the Web screen.
부서 해제 설명:
Do you want to release the department selected members?

When the selected members department is relased, withdraw current department.
In case of concurrent position, Another department information is retained.
관리자권한 추가 팝업 타이틀: This user already authorized. Do you want to delete existing authorization?
부서가 없습니다 조직설계에서 설정하세요:
No information of department..
Organization Management > Organization Design
Set in a department.
조직도 설명:
The department and its members are represented in a tree structure.
You can move by dragging a department or member.
사이트명 사용 설명: Set the site name(generally company name) whether to show or hide in the site organization tree. It is useful in mult-isite.
소속 부서원 펼침 여부: Whether expand members of the department
결재양식 관리 사용여부 툴팁: On the user screen, set whether the folder and templates are exposed. If you hide a folder, the document is not visible on the user screen.
The member's department has been changed.
It is not valid IP fomat.
검색할 운영자(이름+이메일)을 입력하세요: Please enter manager(Name+E mail) to search.
생성된 Works앱이 없습니다: There is no created Works app.
선택 멤버를 삭제하시겠습니까: Do you want to delete selected members?
멤버 삭제 시 자료 복구 불가 경고:
When you delete a selected member, All of member(s)'s information are deleted together.
It is not recover after deletion.
멤버 부서 해제 가이드:
If you want to withdraw from the current department
Use the function 'to click More icon the right side Transfer department > Release Department'.
메뉴운영관리자일괄삭제설명:
Delete selected all menu's manager/admin,
it cant recover deleted data.

Do you want to delete admin in bulk?
IP 목록 업로드 설명:
Only can register TXT file format.
It will be applied when removed invalid of IP type.
If you delete Items, it cant recover.
인식번호(사번/학번)으로 매핑하여 등록: Register Identification Number(Company Identification Number/Classs of number) mapping
멤버사진 일괄등록 설명: ※ After setting ID or Register Identification No(Company Identification No/Class of No) in the Photo file's name. Register through ZIP file.
150x150 사이즈: Photos are automatically applied in size 150x150.
Registered Photos in bulk, you cannot be found the result in below.
You don't have an authority to go to this page.
IP 목록 내보내기 툴팁:
You can apply a TXT file with the format below.

(Ex_Enter a Single IP) ip:123.123.456.567
(Ex_IP Range) range:123.123.456.567-123.123.456.567
(Ex_Subnet) sub:123.123.456.567/3
Select items to import from template.
부서 문서함 관리로 이동하시겠습니까?: Do you want to move to Manage Department Folder?
튜토리얼 다시보기 안내: You can see the tutorial again here.
직위직책직급사용자그룹 구성안내: As a Key classification system of members, it is made up a position/title/grade/user group according to the company bylaws.
템플릿의 샘플을 활용하면: You can easily set it up using samples from templates!
드래그앤드랍기능을 통해 부서 쉽게 지정 가능: Drag & Drop it makes easy to designate a higher / lower department!
조직 일괄등록메뉴에서 많은 부서를 한번에 등록 가능: You can register many departments at once from [Organization Registration].
조직설계 혹은 멤버통합관리 메뉴에서 멤버 생성: Create members from [Organization Design] or [Member Integrated Management]!
멤버의 부서직위메일 조직구성 완료: Complete organization stucture by setting up a member's department/ position/mail group, etc. and saving!
조직설계에서 부서가 미지정된 멤버 확인: From [Organization Design] menu, you can check the members who are not designated right away and prevent omission.
일괄등록 메뉴에서 많은 멤버 한번에 등록 가능: You can register many members at once from [Organization Registration].
관리자 중지 오류 설명:
This account has been set up admin.
If you want to suspend, please release admin set.
메일주소노출 팝업설명2:
Ex : "Kil_dong Hong" (kildong.hong@mycompany.com)
[Not used] Exposed name only.
새롭게 바뀐 UI 및 조직관리 튜토리얼을 알려드립니다: Here are the new UI and Organization Management tutorials.
소속 부서원 펼침 설명: When the organization tree is first displayed after you log in to the site, set whether to expose your department members or not.
Please select a department and click 'OK'.
대화 삭제 기능 설명: ※Allow to delete conversations, attachments, and images by themsleves
시스템 연동 권한설명: Setting/manage interlocking of external system and check logs.
Select allowed access GPS group to delete.
선택한 근무지 삭제 알림: Do you want to delete selected place?
등록된 근태 근무지가 없습니다: There is no registered work place.
접속 허용 IP 툴팁: If you designate an IP band and check allowed access IP Info., the work status cannot be checked if access is outside the specified IP. Mobile WiFi is also considered a restricted area.
근태 근무지 툴팁: You can specify at least one work place in the work place list for that attendence group. If you do not have work place information, Attendence > Setting Workplace, please specify IP band, GPS scoping, etc.
등록된 근무지 없음 알림:
There is no registered work place.
Attendece > Setting Work place, Add work place.
근태자 IP 자동 저장 툴팁: When use IP Autosave, which is automatically saved in EE. account Info. Commuting checks is different from IP and an address, it wil be marked as IP unauth. in company attendence.
근태 통계 툴팁:
Sets whether the user attendence information belonging to the group applies to enterprise attendence statistics.
(ex. For groups of employees or executives who do not check their commute, the statistics are not counted in company attendence statistics)
선택한 IP 삭제 알림: Are you sure you want to delete the selected IP?
선택한 비콘 삭제 알림: Are you sure you want to delete the selected Becon?
근무지 설정 설명: Attendenece can be disabled outside the workplace set by IP band, GPS scoping, and beacons. Click the Add Top button to add multiple work sites.
결재지연방지설명: If the approval was delayed that arrive in the waiting or receive box, the approver be received a delay reminder mail as set date at the bottom.
결재지연기간설정설명:
You can only set it from 1st to 30th based on the date the document arrives.
Ex> When setting 5 to 30 days, Delay alarms are sent once a day from the 5th to the 30th day of the approval's arrival.
Please enter a number smaller than the input value when entering the base date.
Please enter a number greater than the input value when entering the base date.
반경 설정 설명:
Commutes are allowed only within the specified radius.


1. Left-click on the map
2. Drag the mouse to specify the radius
3. Left-click completed (initialized on right-click mouse)
GPS 사용 주의사항: ※ Areas near skyscraper towers,in the buildings, and overpasses may be affected by GPS reception, causing errors.
도로명 또는 지번 주소를 입력하세요: Please enter the road name or Land-lot baseed system.
결재 지연 안내 메일 발송 일자: Date of sending delay reminder mail
데이터백업설명1: Data backup is that allows you to download documents stored in groupware approval, boards, and inboxes to your PC in.
데이터백업설명2: It provides the function to back up in the form of zip files by specifying the creation period and folder by content.
데이터백업설명3: For system security reasons, services are provided on independent screens.
데이터백업설명4: Click the 'Data Backup' button below to access the service.
You are not connected to the data backup service.
일 동안 로그인 하지 않을 시 계정 잠금: Lock your account if you do not log in for days
관리자 외부이메일 요구: If you are an administrator, please register an external mail.
관리자 외부이메일 요구 내용:
When the admin account is locked due to long-term non-connection,
it must be verified by external mail before unlocking it.
새 링크 모바일 앱 이용 주의 문구: ※ When using the mobile app, a window pops up outside through the default browser and displays the screen.
모바일 앱 개편 후 모바일 메뉴 권한 안내: * Home menu is provided only for PC Web services and can not used on Mobile.
화상회의 Zoom 연동서비스 이용을 위해 PC 메신저를 재부팅 하여 주시: Please reboot PC messenger to use Zoom link service for video conferencing.
화상회의 Zoom 연동서비스 이용에 동의하십니까?: Do you agree to use Zoom interlocking service for video conferencing?
화상회의 Zoom 연동서비스 이용을 취소하시겠습니까?: Do you want to cancel using Zoom linked service for video conferencing?
화상회의 Zoom 연동 서비스 이용 동의: Consent to use Zoom interlocking service for videoconferencing
화상회의 Zoom 연동서비스를 이용을 위해 PC 메신저를 재시작 하여 주: Please restart PC messenger to use Zoom link service for video conferencing.
서비스 사용이 불가함에 따라 PC메신저를 재시작 하여 주시기 바랍니다: As the service becomes unavailable, please restart PC messenger.
자료실 정책 툴팁: ※ Storage are unavailable in Mobile app. Storage attachment function in Mobile App are based on Web(PC, Mobile) policy settings.
네트워크 연결 문제로 외부 사이트 접근이 차단되어 지도 서비스 사용이 불: The map service cannot be used because external site access is blocked due to network connection.
방이름안내: Sets the name that will be in the Conference List.
유효시간안내: When you invite external users to video conference, set the valid time of invitation. the user cannot access the video conference room after the set expiration time.
구매한 화상채팅방이 없습니다: There is no video conference room purchased.
2자 이상 20자 이하 입력 해주세요: You have to enter 2 or more characters and 20 or less characters.
회의 품질 저하가 우려됩니다: Concern about the low quality of video conference.
1분 이상 시간을 설정해주세요: Set the time for more than 1m.
참여인원안내: The default number of people is 25 and which can be modified. But if there are more than default people, concern about the low quality of video conference.
GPS 기록 설명: When you select to go to work on mobile, you can check GPS coordinate information on the web through consent to collection of location information.
접속 허용 GPS 툴팁: Attendance check is only possible within the radius selected on the map below. Working hours after setting radius > Please check the use of mobile GPS in the working group
비밀번호 변경 기본규칙: * The password must be a combination of 8 to 16 alphabetic, numeric, and special characters.
비밀번호 관리 설정 설명:
Password is only available for the first registration. (Already registerd member's password cannot modified to register)
{{{arg1}}} Please check the password rules first on screen.
관리자 페이지에서 OTP 사용: Using OTP on the Site admin page
전달 툴팁: The input of some special characters, including uppercase letters and spaces, is restricted.
아이디 툴팁: Please enter between 2-32 characters. Some special characters including space are limited.
전자결재내용: Try using a variety of sample forms.
관리기능내용: Check out the video guide that allows you to master the administrator function in 30 minutes.
관리기능해쉬태그: #First Step of Daou Office #User Training #Administrators Training #Approval Administrators Training #Works Administrators Training #Functional Introduction
목록 다운로드 기간 제한: When downloading a list, only data can be downloaded for 30 days.
목록 다운로드 필수값 입력 요청: When downloading the list, a period must be entered, and only data up to 30 days can be downloaded.
Request for input of list download required values
OpenAPI key 설명1: 1. The key registration is to use the map used to designate the radius in Site Manager > Attendance > Workplace Settings > Access Allowed GPS Information.
OpenAPI key 설명2: 2. We use the KAKAO map provided by the OPEN API, and you can use the map only by registering the JavaScript key obtained through the app registration on the site.
OpenAPI key 설명3: 3. Register the key and it will be reflected on all sites.
생일 연월일 모두 입력: Please enter all date of birth.
2차인증 OTP 기기가 삭제 경고: OTP device registered by user will be deleted.
2차인증 메일 OTP가 초기화 경고: The mail OTP registered by the user is initialized.
2차인증 메일변경실패:
Failed to change email address. 
Invalid or duplicate email address.
2차인증 인증방법 변경실패: Failed to change OTP authentication method.
2차인증 기기 등록 안됨: There is no OTP device or external mail registered in the account.
중복사번 허용: Allowing duplicate Employee No. in One Domain-Multi Site
중복사번 허용 툴팁:
You can't use your domain's Employee No. login.
When changing the Employee No. login in the future, changes due to duplicate Employee No. will be restricted.
장기 미접속 시스템 관리자 중지 여부: Whether to stop long-term inactive system administrator
장기 미접속 시스템 관리자 중지 여부 툴팁: When a user with system admin permission has not logged in for more than 3 months, the status is changed to Stopped.
동기화 설명: When an organizational design change occurs, it is automatically synchronized after {{term}} minutes to channels such as management support and accounting accounting.
조직 설계 동기화 설명:
Immediately reflect organizational design changes to channel apps, such as accounting.
Automatically synchronizes after {{term}} minutes, even if you do not manually synchronize.

Do you want to synchronize the organizational design channels immediately?
멤버통합관리 동기화 설명:
Immediately reflect changes to member consolidation management in channel apps, such as accounting.
Even if you do not manually synchronize, it will automatically synchronize after {{term}} minutes.

Do you want to synchronize the member information channel immediately?
조직일괄등록 동기화 설명:
Immediately reflect changes to the organization's batch registration to the channel app, including accounting.
Automatically synchronizes after {{term}} minutes, even if you do not manually synchronize.

Do you want to synchronize the organization information channel immediately?
삭제 부서 복구 설명:
Are you sure you want to recover the deletion department?
Deletion Department recovery will reflect to all channel apps in {{term}} minutes.

If you want immediate reflection, it can be reflected through manual synchronization in Organization Management > Organization Design.
멤버십스토어로 이동 설명: Purchase history, company information by site, account/capacity settings! Now use the membership store!
근태 이력 삭제 안내문: It is a function that corrects documents when they are deleted without forcing approval.
Please delete the department completely or exclude the email.
관리자 삭제 불가 설명:
Account registered as the default administrator (all privileges).
At least one default administrator (all privileges) must be specified.
고톡 화상대화 종료 안내:
Daou Office Video Meeting (GoTalk)
Service Shutdown information
고톡 화상대화 종료 안내 설명:
Hello, it's Daou Office.
This is to inform you that the Daou Office Video meeting service will end on September 14, 2023.
Thank you very much for using the video meeting service.
In addition, deeply apologize for not maintaining the service.
Please refer to the notice for more details regarding end of the service.
용량 요청 기능 설명: 메일/자료실 메뉴에 용량 추가 요청 버튼이 노출됩니다. 사용자가 용량을 요청하면, 관리자에게 메일이 발송됩니다.
사이트 용량 현황: Dung Lượng Tài Khoản Trang {{argv1}} trong đó {{argv2}} đang được sử dụng / {{argv3}} còn trống.
사이트 용량 부족 경고: 계정을 추가할 수 있는 용량이 부족합니다. 메일그룹의 메일/자료실 기본 용량을 재설정 하거나, 용량을 구매해주시기 바랍니다.
